name: Apache web server
description: This dashboard uses Apache web server metrics to monitor request rates, response times, active connections, traffic volume, and error rates.

name: APM metrics
description: This dashboard uses APM metrics to monitor application performance, including request rates, response times, error rates, and throughput.

name: APM database calls monitoring
description: This dashboard uses APM metrics to monitor database calls, including query performance, response times, error rates, and throughput.

name: APM HTTP API monitoring
description: This dashboard uses APM metrics to monitor HTTP API performance, including request rates, response times, error rates, and success rates.

name: Docker container metrics
description: This dashboard uses container metrics to monitor Docker host performance, including CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network activity per container.

name: CouchDB
description: This dashboard uses CouchDB metrics to monitor database performance, including active tasks, request rates, response times, and resource utilization.

name: ECS container metrics
description: This dashboard uses ECS container metrics using Sidecar to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network activity across ECS tasks and services.

name: ECS EC2 instance metrics
description: This dashboard uses ECS instance metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network performance for ECS instances

name: Flask monitoring
description: This dashboard uses Flask application metrics to monitor request rates, response times, error rates, and throughput for Flask-based applications.

name: HAProxy
description: This dashboard uses HAProxy metrics to monitor request rates, connection rates, response times, error rates, and server health.

name: Kubernetes hostmetrics
description: This dashboard monitors Kubernetes host metrics like CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network activity across Kubernetes nodes etc.

name: Hostmetrics
description: This dashboard uses system host metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, network activity, and filesystem usage across hosts.

name: Jenkins metrics
description: This dashboard uses Jenkins metrics to monitor build statuses, queue times, executor usage, and job performance.

name: Cassandra JMX metrics
description: This dashboard uses Cassandra JMX metrics to monitor read/write latency, request rates, pending tasks, and resource utilization for Cassandra clusters.

name: JVM metrics
description: This dashboard uses JVM metrics to monitor heap memory usage, garbage collection, thread counts, and CPU usage by service.

name: Kubernetes events metrics
description: This dashboard uses Kubernetes event metrics to monitor cluster events, including warnings, errors, pod state changes, and node status updates.

name: Kubernetes cluster metrics
description: This dashboard uses Kubernetes cluster metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, pod capacity, and network performance across the cluster.

name: Kubernetes node metrics (Detailed)
description: his dashboard uses detailed Kubernetes node metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, network activity, and pod allocation on individual nodes.

name: Kubernetes node metrics (Overall)
description: This dashboard uses overall Kubernetes node metrics to monitor aggregate CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network performance across all nodes in the cluster.

name: Kubernetes pod metrics (Detailed)
description: This dashboard uses detailed Kubernetes pod metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network activity for individual pods.

name: Kubernetes pod metrics (Overall
description: This dashboard uses overall Kubernetes pod metrics to monitor aggregate CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network performance across all pods in the cluster.

name: Kubernetes PVC metrics
description: This dashboard uses Kubernetes Persistent Volume Claim (PVC) metrics to monitor storage usage, request rates, and I/O performance of PVCs in the cluster.

name: Key Operations
description: This dashboard uses key operations metrics to monitor P50, P95, P99 latencies, number of calls, request rates, error rates, and throughput for critical service performance.

name: LLM - ChatPDF cost
description: This dashboard uses observability metrics for LLM-powered applications to monitor API costs, token usage, request rates, and response times for ChatPDF services.

name: LLM - ChatPDF performance metrics
description: This dashboard uses performance metrics to monitor response times, request rates, token usage, and error rates for ChatPDF services.

name: Memcached
description: This dashboard uses Memcached metrics to monitor cache hits, misses, memory usage, request rates, and item eviction rates.

name: MongoDB
description: This dashboard uses MongoDB metrics to monitor query performance, connections, memory usage, read/write operations, and replica set status.

name: MySQL
description: This MySQL dashboard monitors QPS, TPS, query latency (P50, P95, P99), slow queries, connections, read/write operations, and replication status.

name: NGINX Ingress controller metrics
description: This dashboard uses NGINX Ingress Controller metrics to monitor request rates, response times, connection status, error rates, and traffic distribution.

name: NGINX Ingress request handling performance
description: This dashboard monitors NGINX Ingress request handling performance, including request rates, response times, error rates, and connection metrics.

name: NGINX metrics
description: This dashboard uses NGINX metrics to monitor request rates, active connections, response times, error rates, and traffic distribution.

name: Nomad metrics
description: This dashboard uses Nomad metrics to monitor CPU usage, memory usage, disk I/O, and network performance for Nomad hosts.

name: PostgreSQL metrics
description: This dashboard uses PostgreSQL metrics to monitor query performance, transactions, connections, cache hit rates, and replication status.

name: RabbitMQ metrics
description: This dashboard uses RabbitMQ metrics to monitor message rates, queue lengths, connection statuses, memory usage, and node performance.

name: SigNoz ingestion analysis
description: This dashboard analyzes SigNoz ingestion metrics, monitoring request rates, data ingestion volumes, processing latencies, and error rates.

name: Temporal.io metrics
description: This dashboard uses Temporal.io metrics to monitor workflow execution times, task queue latencies, activity success rates, and failure rates for Temporal services.
